movies.title: La muerte ronda a Mónica
movies.plot: A wealthy woman is implicated in a series of murders, when a company appears to be in trouble and former associates of the board reappear.
movies.simplePlot: A wealthy woman is implicated in a series of murders, when a company appears to be in trouble and former associates of the board reappear.

biography.bio: Nadiuska was born on January 19, 1952 in Schierling, Bavaria, Germany as Roswicha Bertasha Smid Honczar. She is an actress, known for Conan the Barbarian (1982), The People Who Own the Dark (1976) and La muerte ronda a Mónica (1976). She was previously married to Fernando Montalbán Sánchez.
biography.name: Nadiuska

biography.bio: Arturo Fernández was born on February 21, 1930 in Gijón, Asturias, Spain as Arturo Fernández Rodríguez. He is an actor, known for La casa de los líos (1996), Truhanes (1993) and Tocata y fuga de Lolita (1974). He was previously married to Isabel Sensat.
biography.name: Arturo Fernández

biography.bio: Jean Sorel was born on September 25, 1934 in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France as Jean de Combault-Roquebrune. He is an actor, known for Belle de Jour (1967), The Day of the Jackal (1973) and Sandra (1965). He has been married to Anna Maria Ferrero since January 28, 1962.
biography.name: Jean Sorel

biography.bio: Karin Schubert was born on November 26, 1944 in Hamburg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Delusions of Grandeur (1971), Black Emanuelle (1975) and Companeros (1970).
biography.name: Karin Schubert

biography.bio: Damián Velasco is an actor, known for La légende du vent du nord (1992), Dragón Rapide (1986) and La muerte ronda a Mónica (1976).
biography.name: Damián Velasco

biography.bio: Isabel Luque is known for her work on La monja alférez (1987), Los bingueros (1979) and Pieces (1982).
biography.name: Isabel Luque

biography.bio: Yolanda Ríos was born on December 12, 1951 in Caracas, Venezuela as Yolanda Ciscar Mateu. She was an actress and producer, known for La luna negra (1989), Hitler's Last Train (1977) and Las desarraigadas (1977). She was married to Juan Calot. She died on April 25, 2012 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Yolanda Ríos

biography.bio: Yelena Samarina was born on December 16, 1927 in Omsk, Russian SFSR, USSR as Yelena Georgievna Volozhanina. She was an actress, known for The Werewolf Versus the Vampire Woman (1971), The Happy Sixties (1963), El filo del miedo (1967) and Don Juan in Hell (1991). She was married to Juan Manuel López Iglesias, the founder of Spain's Alta Films. She died on May 4, 2011 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Yelena Samarina

biography.bio: Luis Barboo was born on March 20, 1927 in Vigo, Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain. He was an actor, known for Conan the Barbarian (1982), God Forgives... I Don't! (1967) and The Wind and the Lion (1975). He died on September 30, 2001 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Luis Barboo

biography.bio: Eduardo Bea is an actor, known for Bride to Be (1975), Foul Play (1977) and Pascual Duarte (1976).
biography.name: Eduardo Bea

biography.bio: Antonio Canal was born in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. He is an actor, known for Cuéntame (2001), Who Can Kill a Child? (1976) and Cousin Angelica (1974).
biography.name: Antonio Canal

biography.bio: Jenny Llada is an actress, known for Los chulos (1981), The Worker (1983) and Un rolls para Hipólito (1982).
biography.name: Jenny Llada

biography.bio: Santiago Ontañón was born in 1903 in Santander, Santander, Spain as Santiago Ontañón Fernández. He was an actor and set decorator, known for La tulipe noire (1964), Le bourreau (1963) and Varietés (1971). He died on August 26, 1989 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Santiago Ontañón

biography.bio: Rafael Albaicín was born on June 5, 1919 in Madrid, Spain as Ignacio-Rafael Garcia Escudero. He was an actor, known for Django (1966), Watch Out, We're Mad (1974) and Navajo Joe (1966). He died on September 3, 1981 in Madrid.
biography.name: Rafael Albaicín

biography.bio: Margarida Minguillón was born on February 28, 1947 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. She is an actress, known for Poble Nou (1994), El cor de la ciutat (2000) and Rosa (1995).
biography.name: Margarida Minguillón
